articles.title: Naomi Osaka withdraws from Wimbledon citing a 'leg injury' after labelling Grand Slam an 'exhbition' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The former world No 1 has previously admitted that she was unlikely to compete at the Grand Slam in South London after it was stripped of its ranking points.
articles.content:
Naomi Osaka has pulled out of Wimbledon this year, citing a 'leg injury'.

articles.title: Jack Grealish treats pals to a 'chaotic' and boozy Las Vegas trip with 'chauffeur-driven party bus' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The England footballer, 26, is thought to have splurged on a mammoth hotel suite featuring an interior balcony, while organising for a 40ft snap of them all to be projected onto the side of a high-rise tower.
articles.content:
Jack Grealish has treated eight of his pals to a 'chaotic' and boozy trip to Las Vegas, according to reports.
